snippet: A report raises questions about bias, inadequate training and other problems at a state toxicology that could put the results in thousands of cases in doubt.
abstract: Defense lawyers in Colorado say many criminal cases are in doubt after investigators hired by state found problems including bias against defendants, inadequate training and flawed evidence handling at state toxicology laboratory in Denver.
lead_paragraph: A report raises questions about bias, inadequate training and other problems at a state toxicology that could put the results in thousands of cases in doubt.

headline.seo: Questions Raised About Colorado Toxicology Lab
headline.main: Colorado State Lab Accused of Mishandling Evidence
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Report Faults State Toxicology Lab
